title: Could Xbox Lockhart Come After Series X? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.30.20
description:
Imran and Blessing talk about new rumors about Xbox Series X and what they could mean for Lockhart. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed,Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:15 - Xbox Lockhart Intended To Release After Series X (Thurrott/Brad Sams)
00:15:00 - Fortnite Ditches Early Access Label, Slows Development Of Save The World Mode (IGN/Jordan Oloman)
00:23:55 - Nintendo Theme Park in Japan Won’t Open This Summer (Bloomberg/Takashi Mochizuki)
00:27:50 - Andy McNamara Leaves Game Informer After 29 Years
00:30:35 - PSVR Patent Filed For Advertisements Displayed Within The Headset (IGN/Jordan Oloman)
00:37:30 - Discord is rebranding to shift away from gaming (Engadget/Igor Bonifacic)
00:42:30 - Twitch suspends Donald Trump's channel for hateful conduct (GI.biz/Brendan Sinclair)
00:47:30 - Out today
00:49:00 - Reader mail   -
00:50:41 - Nintendo gave a formal apology over joy-con drift.However, in 2020 how is this still an issue? -  Parker Petrov
00:55:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
